import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; import { Modal, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import './css/search.css' function SearchMaterial() { let[info, setInfo] = useState([]); const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); async function getAllMaterialList(){ await axios.get(`http://localhost:3000/material`) .then(res => { setInfo(res.data) }) } useEffect(()=>{ getAllMaterialList() console.log(info) },[]) const addMaterialPopup = () =>{ setShow(true) return( <> Modal heading Woohoo, you're reading this text in a modal! ) } return (
{ info.map(data=>{ return ( ) }) }
ID Name Quantity Price Action
{data.id} {data.name}
{data.quantity}
Modal title I will not close if you click outside me. Don't even try to press escape key.
{data.price} 🖋️
) } export default SearchMaterial
